hindi:
माया छाया एक सी, बिरला जाने कोय।
 भगता के पीछे लगे, सम्मुख भागे सोय।
english:
Maya chhaya ek si, biral jaane koy.
Bhaagat ke peeche lagte, sammukh bhaage soy.
translation: Maaya is like one's shadow, very wise one realizes it. When you run towards the light away from your shadow, your shadow chases you. But when you run towards your shadow, your shadow runs away of you.
